title: (x) "New German Painting" book cover 3D slab serif - Profil (Decorated 035) {Ignacio}
content:
Hey,

I am desperate to know the name of the typeface used here:

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/3791336665/ref=dp\_image\_0/104-81...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019235056/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/3791336665/ref=dp_image_0/104-8137439-3949500?ie=UTF8&n=283155&s=books "http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/3791336665/ref=dp\_image\_0/104-8137439-3949500?ie=UTF8&n=283155&s=books")

I have searched high and low and can't find it.

Can anyone out there help me?

Rhys
author: rhyspross

comments.content:
I'm not sure the original, but a variation of it I recognize is "Depraved", check here:

Maybe Rob Dobi, the designer, could let you know what he based it from

[http://www.fontriver.com/author/toxic\_type/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019235056/http:/www.fontriver.com/author/toxic_type/ "http://www.fontriver.com/author/toxic\_type/")
Legend. Thanks so much for your help. I am ignorant no longer.
